author: Osmium76
title: This is a dark time for America. Religious freedom is being targeted.
text:
|Users Online Now: 1,605 (|
Page 1
Previous Page
Next Page
This is a dark time for America. Religious freedom is being targeted.
~RYT SED FRED~
Religious convictions and freedoms are enshrined in law.
If someone's faith doesn't allow for or condone sexual deviancy, those individuals can't be forced to acknowledge others who do participate in such according to the demands of them.
What right does anyone have:; to impose special distinctions in favor of those sexually deviant individuals, that serve to eradicate the faith and conviction others might have contrary to that?
While it is not right for me to demand you worship or believe as I do, It is also not right for you to force me to believe as you do if you are sexually deviant and my faith says to associate with or acknowledge such is a sin.
By being forced to acknowledge sexually deviant lifestyle and/or gender specific terms or preferences, religious freedom is being egregiously eviscerated.
It is essentially saying religion is no longer a protected freedom or right.
Individuals who have a strong conviction in such matters can't be forced to accept something their religion deems unacceptable.
The non religious views of people doesn't mean those people get to negate the practice of one following their religion in such capacity.
It's a violation of law that has long upheld those religious convictions as being un-revokable.
This is a major issue.
Which is why the following Supreme Court opinion is so volatile.
The comment section is disturbing in the following article, as is the article itself.
There are people that want to do away with religious freedom and liberty that has always enshrined the right for people to practice long held and established religious views on this.
Supreme Court justice slams MO court, says it shows ‘danger’ of same-sex marriage decision
[
Chasing the dream....realizing the Revelation. ~Intrepid searcher~
Ecclesiastes 12:13 “Let us hear the conclusion of the whole matter: Fear God, and keep his commandments: for this is the whole duty of man.”

author: KVUE
title: ProPublica: Sepsis rates have spiked in Texas since abortion ban went into effect - NewsBreak
text:
Texas
ProPublica: Sepsis rates have spiked in Texas since abortion ban went into effect
1 hours ago
TEXAS, USA — A new analysis by ProPublica shows that after Texas' 2021 abortion ban went into effect, pregnancy became far more dangerous – partially due to the danger of developing sepsis, a life-threatening condition. Since 2021, when the "Texas Heartbeat Act" went into effect, ProPublica found that...

author: Do HOJE EM DIA
title: Chuva segue em BH nesta sexta; qualidade do ar melhora
text: Céu amanheceu com muitas nuvens nesta sexta (Clima ao Vivo/Reprodução) Belo Horizonte, que passou meses enfrentando dias de sol e calor, terá, nesta sexta-feira (11), o terceiro dia consecutivo de chuva. De acordo com a Defesa Civil, o céu fica nublado a parcialmente nublado com chuvas, por vezes fortes, acompanhadas de raios e rajadas de vento ocasionais. A previsão é de 30 mm de chuva na metrópole hoje. A temperatura mínima foi de 17,3°C e a máxima prevista é de 27°C. A chuva também ajuda a melhorar a qualidade do ar. A capital, que chegou a registrar por diversos dias climas de deserto, com índices inferiores a 12%, terá hoje a a umidade relativa do ar mínima em torno de 60%, à tarde. Em Minas, 736 cidades estão sob o aviso de “tempestade”, classificado como “perigo potencial”. O alerta é válido para as seguintes regiões: Triângulo Mineiro, Alto Paranaíba, Central Mineira, Zona da Mata, Vale do Rio Doce, Oeste, Sul, Sudoeste, Região Metropolitana de Belo Horizonte, Jequitinhonha, Vale do Mucuri, Norte e Noroeste. Os moradores de Belo Horizonte podem receber os alertas de risco de chuvas fortes, granizo, tempestades, vendavais, alagamentos, risco de deslizamentos de terra e outros fenômenos meteorológicos pelo Canal Público do WhatsApp: https://bit.ly/DefesaCivilBH A população também pode acompanhar os alertas e as recomendações da Defesa Civil por SMS. Para se cadastrar, basta enviar uma mensagem de texto com o CEP da sua rua para o número 40199 e uma mensagem de confirmação será enviada na sequência. O serviço não tem custo. Pelas redes sociais os alertas podem ser acompanhados por meio do Instagram, X, Facebook e pelo canal público do Telegram no endereço: defesacivilbh. Leia mais: [Engler x Fuad e Elisa x Tony: horário eleitoral começa nesta sexta com 5 minutos para cada candidato](/politica/engler-x-fuad-e-elisa-x-tony-horario-eleitoral-comeca-nesta-sexta-com-5-minutos-para-cada-candidato-1.1034591)[Dezoito marcas de creatina são reprovadas em estudo de associação nutricional](/economiaefinancas/dezoito-marcas-de-creatina-s-o-reprovadas-em-estudo-de-associac-o-nutricional-1.1034589)[Caso Marielle Franco: Moraes confirma júri popular de Lessa e Élcio para 30 de outubro](/geral/caso-marielle-franco-moraes-confirma-juri-popular-de-lessa-e-elcio-para-30-de-outubro-1.1034595)
